snippet: A California man who prosecutors said was on his way to Syria to join a Qaeda group was arrested on Monday near the Canadian border in Blaine, Wash., on a terrorism charge, federal officials said.
abstract: California man Nicholas Teausant, who prosecutors say was on his way to Syria to join Qaeda group is arrested near Canadian border in Blaine, Wash, on terrorism charge.
lead_paragraph: A California man who prosecutors said was on his way to Syria to join a Qaeda group was arrested on Monday near the Canadian border in Blaine, Wash., on a terrorism charge, federal officials said.

headline.main: Washington: Arrested Man Is Accused of Seeking to Join Militants in Syria
headline.print_headline: Washington: Arrested Man Is Accused of Seeking to Join Militants in Syria
